page.title: 02LEISURE AND RECREATION.
page.content: { Bury Knowle Park}is a large park in the middle of{Headington}with exits onto{London Road, Chestnut Avenue and} {North Place.} There is a special fenced off area for children to play in, which includes a roundabout, slides and swings. One of the main features of the park is the beautiful old stone building which contains a{Library,Health Clinic and{surgery.}It was built in the{1800s and opened as a library in{1932.} They have{17000}books for adults and about{5000}for children. There are about{7000}people using the library. In the grounds, there are goalposts for football playing, and a crazy golf course. Also featured are five tennis courts which are very popular with the locals. The park is often a venue for public events.
